title: Sylhet-6
text:
Sylhet-6 is a constituency represented in the <a href="Jatiya%20Sangsad">Jatiya Sangsad</a> (National Parliament) of <a href="Bangladesh">Bangladesh</a> since 2008 by <a href="Nurul%20Islam%20Nahid">Nurul Islam Nahid</a> of the <a href="Awami%20League">Awami League</a>.
Boundaries.
The constituency encompasses <a href="Beanibazar%20Upazila">Beanibazar</a> and <a href="Golapganj%20Upazila">Golapganj</a> upazilas.
History.
The constituency was created for the first general elections in newly independent Bangladesh, held in 1973.
Elections.
Elections in the 2010s.
Nurul Islam Nahid was re-elected unopposed in the <a href="2014%20Bangladesh%20general%20election">2014 general election</a> after opposition parties withdrew their candidacies in a boycott of the election.
